TopicTitle: Trying to fly through the island airfield tower

Articles.Content: I failed, but I hope you like the explosions

I don’t think it’s possible to fit through those gaps, but the windows aren’t solid- I’ve base-jumped Kerbals out of them before. Try planting flags in two windows that are aligned to make it easier to aim?

Nothing beats the sound of ragtime piano to accompany the sound of crash, explode-y Kerbal shenanigans!
